Mechanical System.Name: Elastic_Pendulum
Mechanical System.Notes:
This system consists of a pendulum in which the string connected to the bob is replaced by a spring.
It is important to notice that if r0 is the equilibrium position of the spring, because of gravity, the equilibrium position will be shifted downward
The new equilibrium position for theta = 0 is obtained by equating the magnitudes of the elastic force and the force of gravity:
|Fe| = k * (r_eq - r0)
|Fg| = m * g
r_eq = r0 + m * g / k
The displacement of the equilibrium position is equal to m * g / k
